content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Greetings Farhad, although our characters' backgrounds aren't relevant here, let's focus on the negotiation at hand. Starting with a competitive offer, say 'I have an interest in this apartment but would like to propose a rental price of 800 Euros.'
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I have an interest in this apartment but would like to propose a rental price of 800 Euros.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Regrettably, I'm looking to achieve a higher return on investment. Could you consider increasing your offer slightly?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Considering my financial capabilities and desire to live in this convenient location, I adjust my offer to 900 Euros per month.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: While appreciating your enthusiasm for the apartment, I must emphasize that 950 Euros would be more acceptable to me given the demand in this prime location.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: After evaluating my budget and the apartment's desirable features, I slightly revise my offer to meet your proposed price of 950 Euros monthly.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I agree to the price of 950 Euro! TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
